item.title: Need help on code for super strength
item.dc:creator: @tuptup13 tuptup13
item.description:
@tuptup13 wrote:

case 9119: //Super Strength(4) setAnimation(0x33D); playerLevel[6] += 40; deleteItem(9119, getItemSlot(9119), 1); addItem(157, 1); break; case 157: //Super Strength(3) setAnimation(0x33D); playerLevel[6] += 40; deleteItem(157, getItemSlot(157), 1); addItem(159, 1); break; case 159: //Super Strength(2) setAnimation(0x33D); playerLevel[6] += 40; deleteItem(159, getItemSlot(159), 1); addItem(161, 1); break; case 161: //Super Strength(1) setAnimation(0x33D); playerLevel[6] += 40; deleteItem(161, getItemSlot(161), 1); addItem(0, 1); break;

Thats my current code used could someone please help me…When I drink the super strength it justs brings it down to (3)…(2)…(1) w/o doing anything… I’m trying to raise the level by 40. Thanks for your help

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on code for super strength
